code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Modal from"react-modal";import pub from'../images/pub.jpeg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pub=()=>{const[modal_IsOpen,set_IsOpen]=useState(false);const openModal=()=>{set_IsOpen(true);};const closeModal=()=>{set_IsOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:openModal,className:"square",src:pub}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{isOpen:modal_IsOpen,onRequestClose:closeModal,className:"modal",ariaHideApp:false,closeTimeoutMS:200,onAfterOpen:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-img",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img",src:pub}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:closeModal,className:"btn",children:"Back"})]})})]});};export{Pub as default};
